WaNoMeta.Description: A WaNo used for direct laser writing used in generating coarse-grained polymer networks, based on Dr. Elaheh Sedghamiz's LAMMPS scripts.

WaNoFloat.name: BoxX
WaNoFloat.description: X dim of the printing box in nm (>1.5)

WaNoFloat.name: BoxY
WaNoFloat.description: Y dim of the printing box in nm (>1.5)

WaNoFloat.name: BoxZ
WaNoFloat.description: Z dim of the printing box in nm (>1.5)

WaNoBool.name: boolRandomSeeds
WaNoBool.description: Assign system date time based random seeds to initial coordinates.

WaNoBool.name: boolAdvanced
WaNoBool.description: Use advanced mode to manually define number of porogen. If unchecked, the default porogen number equals (num_Monomer + num_crosslinker).
